metadata.title: CVE-2021-30199 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In filters/reframe_latm.c in GPAC 1.0.1 there is a Null PointerDereference, when gf_filter_pck_get_data is called. The first arg pck maybe null with a crafted mp4 file,which results in a crash.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
